name: Space Fight/Flight
description:
A wave-based top down shooter!

Control your ship with the arrow keys, (Left and Right to turn, Up to activate thrusters) fire your weapons with the Z key and launch missiles with thew X key.

Survive for as long as you can and get the high score!

Also includes a built-in level editor, you can open your own levels by right-clicking on the "Play" button in the main menu.
